name: Religious Commitment Inventory-10
description: A 10-item measure of religious commitment with two subscales: intrapersonal religious commitment (personal faith and relationship with God) and interpersonal religious commitment (involvement in religious community and activities).
reference: Worthington, E. L., Jr., Wade, N. G., Hight, T. L., Ripley, J. S., McCullough, M. E., Berry, J. W., ... & O'Connor, L. (2003). The Religious Commitment Inventory-10: Development, refinement, and validation of a brief scale for research and counseling. Journal of Counseling Psychology, 50(1), 84-96.
instructions: Read each of the following statements. Using the scale, indicate the response that best describes how true each statement is for you.

questions.name: rci_1
questions.description: I often read books and magazines about my faith.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_2
questions.description: I make financial contributions to my religious organization.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_3
questions.description: I spend time trying to grow in understanding of my faith.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_4
questions.description: Religion is especially important to me because it answers many questions about the meaning of life.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_5
questions.description: My religious beliefs lie behind my whole approach to life.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_6
questions.description: I enjoy spending time with others of my religious affiliation.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_7
questions.description: Religious beliefs influence all my dealings in life.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_8
questions.description: It is important to me to spend periods of time in private religious thought and reflection.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_9
questions.description: I enjoy working in the activities of my religious organization.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me

questions.name: rci_10
questions.description: I keep well informed about my local religious group and have some influence in its decisions.
questions.min_label: Not at all true of me
